price: 53. Y (recordad) cuando entregamos a Moisés el Libro (la Torá) que distinguía entre la verdad y la falsedad para que pudierais guiaros.
arabic: وَإِذۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wal-fur'qāna laʿallakum tahtadūna
